name: JIAYI QIU
intro_content: I am an inspired data jounalist, a Bay area, USA-based publication. I use maps, data visualisations to cover a range of topics in technology, politics and social justice.
Previously, I was a data scientist sepecialized in modeling and algorithms .
Prior to that, I graduated from the University of California,Berkeley with a Bachelor's Degree double majoring in Economics and Data Science.
